name: breaking
description: Requires a semver-major release due to breaking public API changes

name: regression
description: Something was working in a previous version

name: can close?
description: We will close this in 30 days if there's no objection

name: blocked
description: Cannot make progress on this due to external factor

name: prioritized
description: valuable work that we hope to complete soon

name: more info needed
description: The issue isn't clear as written

name: discussion needed
description: We have to do some design work in a meeting

name: funding needed
description: We could prioritize this based on donation to https://opencollective.com/aspect-build
